item.title: Emergent Themes in Aperiodic Non-deterministic Musical Compositions
item.description: The directed graph in the video has information flowing through it as time passes. A vertex represents a change to the incoming signal - it either increases or decreases the pitch of the signal as it continues to the next vertex. A vertex with more than one edge leading to other vertices can have one of three modes to pass the signal forward: Parallel - the signal will continue to all connected vertices at the same time.

item.title: Look at the Snow Falling
item.description: Instruments laid out using Ableton and sequenced using Orca
